channel.title: [718] Frost Blades "Unable to connect:Bad session ID"
channel.description:
Anybody know how to fix that login error? Note: This prints nothing into my server console/client console and the server starts and runs fine. SCREENSHOT: [url=http://prntscr.com/4i7i4t]http://prntscr.com/4i7i4t[/url]
Heres the source i'm using: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/519533-frost-blades-source-added-sql-setup-guide.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/519533-frost-blades-source-added-sql-setup-guide.html[/url]
Any help is very much appreciated.

item.title: [718] Frost Blades "Unable to connect:Bad session ID"
item.dc:creator: @qtst35 qtst35
item.description:
@qtst35 wrote:

are you running your server through localhost?

if so i assume you have checked or changed the ip to 0.0.0.0 / 127.0.0.1 (if not do that) in Loader.java client

also check the the port the server is listening on and the port the client is sending on are the same.

if you are not localhost then make sure the port is open and again make sure its the right port.

Read full topic
item.source: [718] Frost Blades "Unable to connect:Bad session ID"
